text: Kristián Mihálek (born 10 March 2000) is a Slovak footballer who currently plays for Petržalka, on loan from Spartak Trnava, as a winger. ==Club career== ===Spartak Trnava=== Mihálek made his professional Slovak league debut for Spartak Trnava against Nitra at pod Zoborom on 18 May 2019. Mihálek was featured in the starting line-up and played the entire game, which Trnava won after a second-half goal by David Depetris.NITRA VS. SPARTAK TRNAVA 0 - 1 18.05.2019, soccerway.com ====Loan to Pohronie==== Mihálek had joined Pohronie in February 2020 on a half-season agreement. He failed to make an appearance in the club as he returned from the loan. ==References== ==External links== * FC Spartak Trnava official profile * Futbalnet profile * * Fortuna Liga profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Spartak Trnava players Category:FK Pohronie players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:People from Bratislava Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava
title: Kristián Mihálek
